title: How can I check messages from contacts I have already put in my SMS message blacklist?
answer: Go to Messaging > Menu > Harassment filter. Touch Messages to check. ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=140407)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=140408) []()![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=140409) The figures are for your reference only. The actual screens may vary.
